description: This file defines the main React application component 'App' for a network devices management web interface, including routing, error boundary, and UI composition.

classes.name: ErrorBoundary
classes.description: A React component that catches JavaScript errors anywhere in its child component tree, logs those errors, and displays a fallback UI instead of the component tree that crashed.

methods.name: App
methods.description: Main React functional component that manages routing, modals, and layout for the network devices application.

methods.name: openEdit
methods.description: Sets the device for editing and opens the form modal.

methods.name: onFormSuccess
methods.description: Handles successful form submissions, closes modal, and triggers data refresh if needed.
